overview: The most important things in life for Frankie (Kirsten Price) aren't fame, fortune or anything money can buy. They're her relationships: four coupled friends from college and her husband, Mark. But somewhere along the way, Mark became distant, which led to Frankie being lonely. . . and ultimately led to Frankie having an affair with her best friend's husband. During a dinner party at her house, the truth is unexpectedly revealed not only for Frankie and Mark, but also for swingers Mandy & Jeff and on-the-rocks Tiffany & Russell. Will there be second chances? Or, will the damage be irreparable?
tagline: Which one is your favorite dish?
title: Dinner at Frankie's
